column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////WE LIVE IN CHICAGO!! Why people like this place is beyond me.I have been to the Oak Park location.It feels like processed food and not really great Italian.For the price
column2: I prefer Mancini's across the street or Freddy's in Cicero.Lou's is for atmosphere
column3: not great food.Anytime something turns into a chain it loses the authenticity of the original intention.
